attributes.action: Make UK registered companies set up thier call centres in the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is aimed at companies incorporated in the UK, who wish to set up customer call centres. They will be required to base the call centre in the UK, and have it manned by UK nationals to facilitate a easier customer service experience for the poor down trodden and exasparated consumer.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to " Make UK registered companies set up thier call centres in the UK."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15856.asp

Prime Minister's Office
